version.new: Added Wizard components to support repeatable values as well as 'confirmed-change' linked checkboxes and fields.
version.change: Now using GUI Block level constants such as EMPHAZISED_BLOCK instead of 'Block 3'.
Optimizations to speed loading of thumbnails.
version.new: Basket: New functionality for clearing the basket, adding multiple and single files to the basket.
Repository OutputModules now support accessing the first image record of an asset as well as a thumbnail.
Importers: Abstract, XML, Tab-Delimited, and EXIF fully functioning. Batch importing of assets now available.
Importers: Abstract, XML, Tab-Delimited, and EXIF fully functioning. Batch importing of assets now available.
New "Basket" system for collecting [Asset] Ids during the session. The Basket allows for easy user-selection of a large number of items.
version.change: Changed the StartupCheck classes to use the new Wizard.
Changed actions to use Everyone and Users group IDs of "edu.middlebury.agents.everyone" and "edu.middlebury.agents.users".
version.fix: Wizard now can handle field names with .'s in them.
RepositoryInputOutputModules now check for the right record interface.
version.change: New Wizard system based on nested components. Much more extensible and easy-to-use than the old system.
Updating much of Polyphony to support the RequestContext
version.new: Added an abstract Action class-hierarchy to enable the easy creation of class-based actions.

version.fix: clone() is a reserved word in PHP5. All clone methods have been renamed replicate().
textdomain() calls now specify NULL instead of no argument to prevent PHP Warnings.
version.important: Polyphony now runs on PHP5 and on Win32 systems in addition to PHP4.3 and POSIX systems.

version.change: Authentication now plays nicely with GET parameters and maintains them around during the authentication sequence.
Fixed some references to the non-existant "SharedManager"
Reconfigured modules to work with version 2 of the OSIDs.
Authentication now fully uses Harmoni's implementation of the AuthN OSID as Harmoni's own Authentication/LoginHandlers have been removed.
version.new: Graphical tools have been created for managing hierarchical authorizations.
The 'dr' module provides actions for displaying images and thumbnails from a Digital Repository, making use of the DRInputOutputModules.
DRInputOutputModules provide common functions for displaying and editing DigitalRepository records.
The 'auth' module provides shared actions for logging in and out.
StartupCheck and ConfigSystem: These should allow easy creation of browser-based install/configuration options and setup. They are undocumented and untested.
Languages: Shared actions for generating a "switch language" form, as well as the logic for performing that switch.

The Wizard library provides a system for the generation of dynamic Multi-step wizards. The Wizard library handles the catching, storing, and validating of form submitions, as well as handle user-progress through the wizard.
